title: Atlantic Sea Farms
body: Atlantic Sea Farms partners with lobstermen on the rocky coast of Maine to farm kelp. Atlantic Sea Farms partners with lobstermen up and down the rocky coast of Maine to farm kelp in the region ...

title: The Seaweed Supplier
body: Atlantic Sea Farms partners with fishermen up and down the Maine coast to produce kelp products sold through stores and restaurant chains. Atlantic Sea Farms of Saco started out growing seaweed ...
